Nightshift chuckles after realizing how he worded his answer.

" Oh yeah, t=
hat's right, we gotta go inta space for that. Although, lemme try someth'n =
else. "

He returns to the computer and sits at the control panel.

" Compu=
ter, bypass last configuration and recalibrate user configuration ta my spe=
cs. " 

He turns to Polarclaw.

" I'm try'n ta change users so I can get co=
ntrol of the satellite. Hopefully get it ta work for us."

Don't be envious=
 of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothin=
g is worth more than family and friends.

On Jan 6, 2012, at 7:01 PM, Super=
 Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift ra=
ises his paw.
> >
> > " I'll go, if anyone's good at climbing its a cat, an=
d now I'm a cat. I
> > promise I'll be careful, and I will land on my feet.=
 Besides better me than
> > you guys."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> POLAR CLAW looked at=
 NIGHTSHIFT for a moment as if he had gone daft,
> "You intend to climb up =
to the satellite?" Of course since satellites
> were in space that would ma=
ke the climb difficult to say the least.
> 
> There was a small grunt from =
PROWL, "I believe that it is Legacy and
> Lord Elder were suggesting that w=
e could send a message up there that
> would reset the satellite so that it=
 would start talking to us again."
> 
> WOLFGANG nodded, he really didn't w=
ant to go into space at the moment.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-1E36CAE4-7128-4E57-A374-DE1DBD357378

nge users so I can get control of the satellite. Hopefully get it ta work f=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshift raises his =
paw.<br>
><br>
> " I'll go, if anyone's good at climbing its a cat, a=
nd now I'm a cat.  I<br>
> promise I'll be careful, and I will land on m=
y feet.  Besides better me than<br>
> you guys."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br=
>
<br>
POLAR CLAW looked at NIGHTSHIFT for a moment as if he had gone daft,=
<br>
"You intend to climb up to the satellite?" Of course since satellites<=
br>
were in space that would make the climb difficult to say the least.<br>=

<br>
There was a small grunt from PROWL, "I believe that it is Legacy and<=
br>
Lord Elder were suggesting that we could send a message up there that<b=
r>
would reset the satellite so that it would start talking to us again."<b=
r>
<br>
WOLFGANG nodded, he really didn't want to go into space at the mome=
nt.<br>
<br>
